description:
Got a full day planned on the slopes? Get all-day comfort where it counts in these Ski Targeted Cushion Extra Stretch Over the Calf Socks. If staying out longer is your game-plan, these socks have everything you need to stay comfortable: Smartwool’s most advanced Indestructawool technology for enhanced durability, 4 Degree elite fit system for an unmatched performance fit, body-mapped mesh zones for added breathability, and extra stretch around the calves.

  • Extra stretch calf for greater comfort that accommodates fuller calves
  • Indestructawool™ technology with extended durability zones
  • 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a dialed-in, performance-oriented fit
  • Shred Shield™ technology reduces wear from toes
  • Wider welt for secure fit and comfort
  • Body-mapped mesh zones for added breathability
name: Smartwool Ski Targeted Cushion Extra Stretch OTC Socks - Unisex
